openwebui_variables.name: ENABLE_GOOGLE_DRIVE_INTEGRATION
openwebui_variables.description: Enables or disables Google Drive integration. If set to true, and `GOOGLE_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID` & `GOOGLE_DRIVE_API_KEY` are both configured, Google Drive will appear as an upload option in the chat UI.

openwebui_variables.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_API_KEY
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the API key for Google Drive integration.

openwebui_variables.name: GOOGLE_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the client ID for Google Drive (client must be configured with Drive API and Picker API enabled).
